summary: To create a new exercise plan focused on Zone 2 cardio and strength training to improve cardiovascular and metabolic health.
trigger: Dr. Warren initiated an aggressive lifestyle intervention to lower health markers before considering medication.
rationale: Dr. Warren requested a targeted exercise plan as part of an effort to avoid prescribing medication like a statin.
The plan incorporates Zone 2 cardio specifically to improve cardiovascular efficiency.
Resistance training was included to help with metabolic health.
